title: Monitor Open Pit Slope Stability
description: A geotechnical engineer analyzes data from a slope monitoring radar to detect any movement in the pit walls that could indicate a potential failure.

tasks.description: Review the real-time displacement data from the slope stability radar.
tasks.expected_outcome: A heatmap showing wall movement is displayed.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify any areas with accelerating movement, which is a precursor to failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies a small area where the rate of movement is increasing.

tasks.description: Set an alarm threshold for that area and notify mine operations to restrict access below that section of the pit wall as a precaution.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new alarm is set, and a safety exclusion zone is communicated to operations.
